00025 #include "mcu.h"
00026 
00027 
00028 #include <inttypes.h>
00029 #include BOARD_CONFIG
00030 #include "LPC21xx.h"
00031 
00032 
00033 /* declare functions and values from crt0.S & the linker control file */
00034 extern void reset(void);
00035 
00036 void mcu_arch_init(void) {
00037 
00038   /* set PLL multiplier & divisor. */
00039   /* values computed from config.h */
00040   PLLCFG = PLLCFG_MSEL | PLLCFG_PSEL;
00041   /* enable PLL                    */
00042   PLLCON = PLLCON_PLLE;
00043   /* commit changes                */
00044   PLLFEED = 0xAA;
00045   PLLFEED = 0x55;
00046 
00047   /* wait for PLL lock */
00048   while (!(PLLSTAT & PLLSTAT_LOCK))
00049     continue;
00050 
00051   /* enable & connect PLL */
00052   PLLCON = PLLCON_PLLE | PLLCON_PLLC;
00053   /* commit changes                */
00054   PLLFEED = 0xAA;
00055   PLLFEED = 0x55;
00056 
00057   /* setup & enable the MAM */
00058   MAMTIM = MAMTIM_CYCLES;
00059   MAMCR = MAMCR_FULL;
00060 
00061   /* set the peripheral bus speed */
00062   /* value computed from config.h */
00063   VPBDIV = VPBDIV_VALUE;
00064 
00065   /* set the interrupt controller to flash */
00066   MEMMAP = MEMMAP_FLASH;
00067 
00068   /* clear all interrupts     */
00069   VICIntEnClear = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00070   /* clear all FIQ selections */
00071   VICIntSelect = 0x00000000;
00072   /* point unvectored IRQs to reset() */
00073   VICDefVectAddr = (uint32_t)reset;
00074 
00075 }
